name: Dragon's Breath
description: You touch one willing creature and imbue it with a chosen breath weapon: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. Until the spell ends, the creature can use its action to exhale a 15-foot cone of that type. Each creature in the cone makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
higherLevels: Damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

effects.description: Target gains a breath action (15-foot cone, Dex save half) dealing 3d6 chosen damage (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison) for the duration.
Represents the breath weapon damage when the target uses the granted action.
